title: Properties of mass on a spring that change period

content.prompt:
A block attached to the lower end of a vertical spring oscillates up and down. If the spring obeys Hookeâ€™s law, the period of oscillation depends on which of the following?

I. Mass of the block

II. Amplitude of the oscillation

III. Force constant of the spring

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
